requests.name: Pago recurrente
requests.rawModeData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding= "UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE paymentService PUBLIC "-//Worldpay//DTD Worldpay PaymentService v1//EN" "https://dtd.worldpay.com/paymentService_v1.dtd">
<paymentService merchantCode="BEDSONLINEEUR" version="1.4">
    <submit>
        <order orderCode="{{order}}">
            <description>CARGO ADICIONAL</description>
            <amount currencyCode="GBP" exponent="2" value="1055" debitCreditIndicator="credit"/>
            <paymentDetails>
                <TOKEN-SSL tokenScope="shopper">
                    <paymentTokenID>{{tokenId}}</paymentTokenID>
                </TOKEN-SSL>
            </paymentDetails>
            <shopper>
                <shopperEmailAddress>shopper@provider.com</shopperEmailAddress>
                <authenticatedShopperID>UniqueshopperID</authenticatedShopperID>
            </shopper>
        </order>
    </submit>
</paymentService>

requests.name: Pago inicial
requests.rawModeData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE paymentService PUBLIC "-//WorldPay//DTD WorldPay PaymentService v1//EN" "http://dtd.worldpay.com/paymentService_v1.dtd">
<paymentService version="1.4" merchantCode="BEDSONLINEEUR">
  <submit>
    <order orderCode="{{order}}">
      <description>Pago inicial.</description>
      <amount currencyCode="GBP" exponent="2" value="5000"/>
      <paymentDetails>
        <VISA-SSL>
          <cardNumber>4444333322221111</cardNumber>
          <expiryDate>
            <date month="03" year="2019"/>
          </expiryDate>
          <cardHolderName>J. Shopper</cardHolderName>
          <cvc>123</cvc>
          <cardAddress>
            <address>
              <address1>47A</address1>
              <address2>Queensbridge Road</address2>
              <address3>Suburbia</address3>
              <postalCode>CB94BQ</postalCode>
              <city>Cambridge</city>
              <state>Cambridgeshire</state>
              <countryCode>GB</countryCode>
              <telephoneNumber>0122312345</telephoneNumber>
            </address>
          </cardAddress>
        </VISA-SSL>
        <session shopperIPAddress="123.123.123.123" id="0215ui8ib1" />
      </paymentDetails>
      <shopper>
        <shopperEmailAddress>jshopper@myprovider.int</shopperEmailAddress>
        <authenticatedShopperID>UniqueshopperID</authenticatedShopperID>
      </shopper>
      <createToken tokenScope="shopper">
        <tokenEventReference>{{token}}</tokenEventReference>
        <tokenReason>C</tokenReason>
      </createToken>
    </order>
  </submit>
</paymentService>

requests.name: Refund
requests.rawModeData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding= "UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE paymentService PUBLIC "-//Worldpay//DTD Worldpay PaymentService v1//EN" "https://dtd.worldpay.com/paymentService_v1.dtd">
<paymentService merchantCode="BEDSONLINEEUR" version="1.4">
    <modify>
        <orderModification orderCode="{{order}}">
            <refund>
                <amount currencyCode="GBP" exponent="2" value="100"/>
            </refund>
        </orderModification>
    </modify>
</paymentService>
